item.title: How to Network
item.author: Author
item.description: Maybe you’re about to graduate, just graduated, or have been teaching yourself to code for the last few years, and you don’t know how to get your foot in the door with that first job. You see all those “entry-level” jobs that expect a year or three of experience. Networking is incredibly important, especially if you don’t have any professional experience in the tech industry yet. We’ve all heard it: “it’s not what you know; it’s who you know.
